name: Wolfchild
overview: The world's most renowned biogenetic scientist has been kidnapped and brainwashed into creating an army of bloodthirsty mutant warriors. Suddenly the fate of all man-kind rest in the hands of his youngest son... and a top-secret mutating experiment known as "Project Wolfchild." • 10 freaky levels filled with mind-blowing mazes, brain-twisting puzzles and against-all-odds combat action. • CD-quality graphics and a rockin' stereo soundtrack. • Gruesome cast of unrelenting schizoid mutants, each with the power to destroy. • Fully animated instruction sequence.
